main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky that descended slowly, accelerated rapidly upwards, and then disappeared without making any sound or emitting light.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 2 hours., The object was silent and did not emit light., The witness estimated its speed to be around 5 m.p.h., The witness estimated the object's distance to be about 200 yards., The witness explained that the object appeared to be a large disc-shaped object of approximately 50 feet in diameter.
witness description: Superintendent, Private Investigator, age 57, male, with special training in UFO research.
